svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 14 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 14, 2024" date: "2024-12-14"
Eth News and Links
Stakers can increase gas limit to 36M
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
• Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #147): Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : stable, gas
limit increased to 36M Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer teams to check
spec conformity & consider how best to handle gas/gossip limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for
now Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Aim to launch over the holidays EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL :
replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to set max & target blob count EIP7251 max effective
balance : minor changes EIP7762 increase min base fee : not included, L2s work around EIP2537 BLS
precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required before ACDE next week Fusaka
upgrade: PeerDAS rebasing on top of Pectra CFI/SFI statuses : considered for inclusion (CFI) EIPs
should be in a future upgrade devnet & scheduled for inclusion (SFI) EIPs will be in the next upgrade
devnet
• Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M Gas limit increase : restricted
by gossip limit, consensus layer teams to check spec conformity & consider how best to handle
gas/gossip limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for now Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Aim to launch over
the holidays EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to
set max & target blob count EIP7251 max effective balance : minor changes EIP7762 increase min base
fee : not included, L2s work around EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM
benchmarks required before ACDE next week
Pectra upgrade:
• Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M
Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M
• Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer teams to check spec conformity &
consider how best to handle gas/gossip limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for now
Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer teams to check spec conformity &
• Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Aim to launch over the holidays EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL :
precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required before ACDE next week
Pectra-devnet-5 spec :
• Aim to launch over the holidays
Aim to launch over the holidays
• EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to set max &
target blob count
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to set max &
• EIP7251 max effective balance : minor changes
EIP7251 max effective balance : minor changes
• EIP7762 increase min base fee : not included, L2s work around
EIP7762 increase min base fee : not included, L2s work around
• EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required before ACDE next week
EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required before ACDE next week
• Fusaka upgrade: PeerDAS rebasing on top of Pectra
Fusaka upgrade:
• PeerDAS rebasing on top of Pectra
• CFI/SFI statuses : considered for inclusion (CFI) EIPs should be in a future upgrade devnet &
scheduled for inclusion (SFI) EIPs will be in the next upgrade devnet
CFI/SFI statuses : considered for inclusion (CFI) EIPs should be in a future upgrade devnet &
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
• Client testing call #16 : Mekong testnet 98% participation, minor changes in pectra-devnet-5 spec
and consensus layer client teams discussed gossip limit
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
• EOF implementers call #63 : Solidity working on EOF as experimental feature and discussed metadata
section
Layer 1
• Toni Wahrstätter: increase gas limit to 36M , beyond 40M currently unsafe due to gossip limit,
review again after Pectra upgrade Prysm cannot set gas limit through validator client currently
Toni Wahrstätter: increase gas limit to 36M , beyond 40M currently unsafe due to gossip limit, review
again after Pectra upgrade
• Prysm cannot set gas limit through validator client currently
• FOCIL breakout #1 : consensus layer spec relatively stable, aim for devnet at end of January
FOCIL breakout #1 : consensus layer spec relatively stable, aim for devnet at end of January
• L1 R&D workshops : notes from pre-Devcon workshops
L1 R&D workshops : notes from pre-Devcon workshops
Research
• Execution Tickets evaluated using agent-based simulation : validator decentralization & MEV capture
is promising but questions remain for builder centralization, off-chain agreements & multi-block MEV
Execution Tickets evaluated using agent-based simulation : validator decentralization & MEV capture is
promising but questions remain for builder centralization, off-chain agreements & multi-block MEV
• EF academic grants round : summary of 39 completed & in progress results from 2022 grants
EF academic grants round : summary of 39 completed & in progress results from 2022 grants
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate
based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
• Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.12.0 : adds reading bootstrap nodes yaml Teku v24.12.0 : block
publishing performance improved
Consensus layer:
• Nimbus v24.12.0 : adds reading bootstrap nodes yaml
Nimbus v24.12.0 : adds reading bootstrap nodes yaml
• Teku v24.12.0 : block publishing performance improved
Teku v24.12.0 : block publishing performance improved
• Execution layer: Besu v24.12.0 : breaking changes including metric name updates Erigon v3.0.0-alpha6
: default mode changed from archive to full node, adds minimal prune mode for low disk space users and
performance improvements Nethermind v1.30.0 : default gas limit increased to 36M and adds Taiko &
Linea L2 support; v1.30.1 : startup fix Reth v1.1.3 : breaking API changes, adds NodePrimitives
(primitive trait abstraction) to several components; v1.1.4 : op-reth fix
Execution layer:
• Besu v24.12.0 : breaking changes including metric name updates
Besu v24.12.0 : breaking changes including metric name updates
• Erigon v3.0.0-alpha6 : default mode changed from archive to full node, adds minimal prune mode for
low disk space users and performance improvements
Erigon v3.0.0-alpha6 : default mode changed from archive to full node, adds minimal prune mode for low
disk space users and performance improvements
• Nethermind v1.30.0 : default gas limit increased to 36M and adds Taiko & Linea L2 support; v1.30.1 :
startup fix
Nethermind v1.30.0 : default gas limit increased to 36M and adds Taiko & Linea L2 support; v1.30.1 :
• Reth v1.1.3 : breaking API changes, adds NodePrimitives (primitive trait abstraction) to several
components; v1.1.4 : op-reth fix
Reth v1.1.3 : breaking API changes, adds NodePrimitives (primitive trait abstraction) to several
Layer 2
• RollCall #9 (L2 standards): Pectra upgrade: L2s don’t use or can work around fee history being
removed and are ok with not including EIP7762 as they work around min blob base fee Overview of L2
execution common core project
• Pectra upgrade: L2s don’t use or can work around fee history being removed and are ok with not
including EIP7762 as they work around min blob base fee
Pectra upgrade: L2s don’t use or can work around fee history being removed and are ok with not
• Overview of L2 execution common core project
Overview of L2 execution common core project
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7839 : Unified network configuration (EL to fetch config
from CL at startup) EIP7840 : Add blob schedule to EL config files
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
• EIP7839 : Unified network configuration (EL to fetch config from CL at startup)
EIP7839 : Unified network configuration (EL to fetch config from CL at startup)
• EIP7840 : Add blob schedule to EL config files
EIP7840 : Add blob schedule to EL config files
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7837 : Diffusive tokens ERC7838 : Instruction specific address ERC7841
: Cross-chain message format and mailbox
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7837 : Diffusive tokens
ERC7837 : Diffusive tokens
• ERC7838 : Instruction specific address
ERC7838 : Instruction specific address
ERC7841
Stuff for developers
• Ape v0.8.22 (Python contract framework): 2x faster checksumming, updated isolation and adds support
for web3.py v7 & python v3.13
Ape v0.8.22 (Python contract framework): 2x faster checksumming, updated isolation and adds support
• Heimdall-rs v0.8.5 : adds LLM postprocessing to decompiler
Heimdall-rs v0.8.5 : adds LLM postprocessing to decompiler
• CTFs: Secureum RACE #35 : answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
CTFs:
• Secureum RACE #35 : answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
• Safe multisig transaction hashes (Bash script): adds support for offchain message hashes
Safe multisig transaction hashes (Bash script): adds support for offchain message hashes
Security
• Clober (DEX) $500k exploit on Base via reentrancy
Clober (DEX) $500k exploit on Base via reentrancy
• 1inch resolver contract exploit via private key compromise
1inch resolver contract exploit via private key compromise
• Radiant Capital October $50M exploit update , developer shared zipped PDF containing macOS malware
received from impersonator of former contractor
Radiant Capital October $50M exploit update , developer shared zipped PDF containing macOS malware
Job Listings
• Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
• Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 6.1 to 226.6 gwei, 18.7 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1
gwei 4.4k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
• Gas: 6.1 to 226.6 gwei, 18.7 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
Gas: 6.1 to 226.6 gwei, 18.7 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
• 4.4k ETH net issuance this week
4.4k ETH net issuance this week
• ETHUSD : $3,538 - $4,021, currently $3,921 all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,538 - $4,021, currently $3,921 all time high $4,878
• ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Ecosystem
• ETHIndia top ten hackathon projects
Notable at app layer
• Sablier Flow : open-ended streams with top ups for recurring payments
General
• Columbia cryptoeconomics workshop videos
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
